entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to drizzle and ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
